title: 6Pack(3/3/6/6/6/10 FT) Original [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Charger Fast Charging Lightning Cable iPhone Charger Cord Compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11 Pro Max/XS MAX/XR/XS/X/8/7 Plus iPad AirPods
descriptions:
Simple, reliable iPhone charging cables for everyday use.

What you get
- 6 Apple‑approved Lightning cables in one box.
- Lengths: two 3‑foot cables, three 6‑foot cables, and one extra‑long 10‑foot cable.
- Works with many Apple devices: iPhone 6 through iPhone 14 (all models listed), iPad Air and iPad mini (several versions), and AirPods.

Why you’ll like them
- Apple MFi Certified: Made to work safely with Apple devices. No warning messages.
- Easy charging and syncing: Plug in to charge your phone or move photos and contacts.
- Fast and safe: Quality copper wire for steady, quick charging.
- Built to last: Strong connectors with reinforced ends to resist fraying.
- Color options available: Choose the look you prefer.

Helpful details
- Long cables mean less bending and easier reach from your chair, bed, or couch.
- Mix of lengths so you can keep one in the bedroom, living room, kitchen, car, and travel bag.
- Works with current iPhones and future iOS updates.

Peace of mind
- 1‑year worry‑free guarantee: refund or replacement if something goes wrong.
- Friendly customer support replies within 24 hours.

In short: Six sturdy, Apple‑approved Lightning cables in handy lengths, made to charge quickly and last, with a full year of protection. Plug in and relax.
